data.prayer: Jesus, make the 5,357 people in the state of Îles Australes who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Îles Australes, French Polynesia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Îles Australes, French Polynesia.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Îles Australes, French Polynesia.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Îles Australes, French Polynesia. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Mataura
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Mataura, Îles Australes, French Polynesia.
Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Îles Australes to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 422 believers in Îles Australes, French Polynesia a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Îles Australes.
